snippet: As rumors of an impending apocalypse, prompted by the Mayan calendar, stir anxiety in Russia, the government has stepped in to encourage calm.
abstract: Russian government officials announce that it is certain that world will not end in December; move is prompted by reports of unusual behavior around country, and is attempt to curb to doomsday panic.
lead_paragraph: As rumors of an impending apocalypse, prompted by the Mayan calendar, stir anxiety in Russia, the government has stepped in to encourage calm.

headline.seo: Mayan ‘End of World’ Stirs Panic in Russia and Elsewhere
headline.main: In Panicky Russia, It’s Official: End of World Is Not Near
headline.print_headline: In Panicky Russia, It’s Official: End of the World Is Not Near
